abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Energy Community of
            South East Europe (APL-2) Project is to improve electricity
            market access for consumers and suppliers through increase
            in the quantity, quality, reliability, safety and efficiency
            of the bulk power transmission system, and strengthen
            capacity of the institutions to participate in the regional
            electricity market. The closing of the project will be
            extended from December 31, 2011, until June 30, 2012. All
            major installation works are expected to be completed on
            site and all project funds will be disbursed by June,
            2012.This will be the second extension of the closing date
            and will result in a cumulative extension of over two years
            from the original closing date (February 28, 2010).
